alert.note: Alert for Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 1:49AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Near Castlewood. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 AM CDT Monday was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will then rise to 9.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will fall to 9.1 feet Wednesday morning. It will then rise to 10.3 feet Friday morning. It will fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning by 1100 AM CDT.
